mapper.select: SELECT dar.id, dar.resource_name, dar.parent_id, dar.url, dar.resource_code, dar.is_del, dar.type FROM djmall_auth_user_role dur LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_role_resource drr ON dur.role_id = drr.role_id LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_resource dar ON drr.resource_id = dar.id WHERE dur.user_id = #{userId}
